text: The Texas Gospel Music Hall of Fame, created by the Texas Gospel Music Association, is a Hall of Famehttps://tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/kltgm dedicated exclusively to recognizing meaningful contributions by individuals and groups in all forms of gospel music.https://www.tgmhf.org/https://m.facebook.com/TGMHF/ ==Inductees== This is a list of those inducted into the Texas Gospel Music Association's: Texas Gospel Music Hall of Fame,https://gov.texas.gov/Apps/Music/Directory/results/txorganizations/p16 listed alphabetically with the year of induction.https://www.tgmhf.org/inductees/https://tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/kltgm ===Individuals=== * Duane Allen * Robert S. Arnold * Joe Atkinson * J.R. Baxter * Les Beasleyhttps://www.bmi.com/news/entry/20031023les_beasley_bmi_salutes_southern_gospel_pioneer_les_beasley * Jim Bradyhttp://www.kkgmam.com/event/texas-gospel-music-hall-of-fame-museum- induction-concert/ * Charles F. Brown * Charlie Campbell * Burl Carter * Cynthia Clawson * Wayne Christianhttps://scttx.com/articles/texas-gospel- music-hall-fame-inducts-singing-christiansmercy-river-boys * Ike Davis * Jack Davis * Paul De La Torre * Doc Dooley * Curtis Elkins * Jane Robin Ellis * Tom & Marie Ellis * Larry Ford * James Fudge * Lee Gann * Marian Garner * Larry Gatlin * Rudy Gatlin * Billy Grable * Lee Owens Graves * Curley & Billie Gatlinhttps://www.news-journal.com/news/local/gospel-music-artist-to-be- inducted-into-hall-of-fame/article_e57b496a-a589-5b6f-86ae-c44f85be81d8.html * Art Greenhaw * John Hall * Martha & Neely Ham * Johnnie High * Lou Wills Hildreth * Pat Hoffmaster * Dallas Holm * Arnold Hyles * Kurt Kaiser * Kate Laswell * Merle Conn Longnecker * Chris & Diane Machen * Bill Mack * Harold & Jean Marshall * Roger McDuff * Gary McSpadden * Walt Mills * Marvin Montgomery * John & Eunice Morrison * Easmon Napier * W. B. Nowlin * Jerry Oliver * Glen Payne * Guy Penrodhttps://www.oconeechambersc.org/event-2528246 * John Points * Cecil Pollock * Larry Randall * J. Howard & Helen Rogers * “Smilin” Joe Roper * Billie Rothfus * David Sapp * Larry Scott * Glenn Sessions * Marion Snider * Frank Stamps * Virgil O. Stamps * Robert Sterling * Jack Taylor * Rod Treme * Mickey Vaughn * Glenn Wilson * Jim Wesson * A. B. (Pop) Wills * Bob L. Wills * Calvin & Lillie Wills * Joe Willis ===Groups=== * The Inspirationals * The Campbell Family (Houston) * The Friendly Four Quartet * The Galileans * The Gatlin Family * The original Chuck-wagon Gang * The Singing Christianshttps://scttx.com/articles/texas-gospel-music-hall-fame-inducts- singing-christiansmercy-river-boys * The Mercy River Boyshttps://www.buckleyturner.com/gospel-commissioner-wayne-christian/ * Phillips Family * Plainsmen Quartet * The Rangers Quartet * The Singing Wills Family * The Stamps Quartet * The Stamps-Baxter Quartet ==In Memoriam== * Charlie Campbell 1938 – 2020 * Gary McSpadden 1943 – 2020 * Walt Mills 1938 – 2020 * Lou Wills Hildreth 1928 – 2019 * Jean Marshall 1942 – 2018 * Kurt Kaiser 1935 – 2018 * Howard Hildreth (The Wills Family) 1926 – 2018 * Les Beasley 1928 – 2018 * Paul DeLatorre 1942 – 2018 * Lillie Wills (The Wills Family) 1928 – 2018 ==See also== * Southern gospel music * Christian country music * Contemporary Christian Music ==References== ==External links== * https://www.tgmhf.org/ Category:Gospel music awards Category:American music awards Category:Music halls of fame Music Category:Awards established in 1971 Category:Dollywood Category:Southern gospel performers Category:Garland, Texas Category:State halls of fame in the United States Category:Halls of fame in Texas
